title: Quarter finals
body:
As we come to the first quarter finals. Who will win?
Flash Wolves or Origen???

(It's best out of 5 btw)

replies.body:
This is a close matchup but I picked Origen. I feel like Xpeke/Soaz are thriving in this meta and their botlane has been huge.

Flash Wolves are crazy inconsistent but when they get it all together they are one of the best teams in the tournament.

Pretty excited for this one.

I want the Flash wolves 2 win, cause...
I like dogs...

I vote for FW.

Origen has tones of experience, their game plan, strategy and experience in the worlds are their winning asset, but this is LOL, it's all about response/micro control speed, and passion/fearless/bravery, on that ground, the Flash Wolves are bunch of young kids (maple and karsa and swordart are only 18 I think), so it's in their best age for this type of game.
Flash Wolves, because even though top may go to OG, mid, adc and jungle belongs to FW.
